data.title: Colin Mochrie, Deb McGrath & Kinley Mochrie
data.meta_description: This week, Steve and Diana chat with Canadian improv legend and nicest human alive, Colin Mochrie. Colin then shares the spotlight with his incredibly talented wife, Deb McGrath, who chats why she chose to step back from her career to raise Kinley Mochrie - who just happens to be our third guest!
data.text:
This week, Steve and Diana chat with Canadian improv legend and nicest human alive, Colin Mochrie, who regales them with the tale of his worst gig ever, and how he knows that Peter Mansbridge packs a strong punch. Colin shares the spotlight with his incredibly talented wife, Deb McGrath, who explains how she met the Queen of England, and why she chose to step back from her career to raise Kinley Mochrie – who just happens to be our third guest. That’s right – it’s a three episode treat! Kinley is a rising acting star and trans activist who may or may not be responsible for the drum kit in Colin’s office.

To learn more about Colin Mochrie, you can check him out at colinmochrie.com or follow him on:

Twitter: @colinmochrie

Facebook: @colinmochrie

Instagram: @colinmochrie7591

To learn more about Deb McGrath, follow her on Insta: @debmcgrathics

And to learn more about Kinley Mochrie, you can find her on:

Twitter: @kinleymochrie

Insta: @kinleymochrie
